channel.title: [PI] PM Glitch REP++
channel.description:
Alright so im using project insanity as a server base
and i got this weird Private message glitch sometimes you receive the Pm sometimes you just dont
if anyone could help me or were to look that would be great :D

item.title: [PI] PM Glitch REP++
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

public void loggedinpm() { pmstatus(2); for (int i1 = 0; i1 < handler.maxPlayers; i1++) { if (!(handler.players[i1] == null) && handler.players[i1].isActive) { handler.players[i1].pmupdate(playerId, 1); } } // loadpm(1327848063, 987); boolean pmloaded = false; 
    for (int i = 0; i < friends.length; i++) {
        if (friends[i] != 0) {
            for (int i2 = 1; i2 < handler.maxPlayers; i2++) {
                if (handler.players[i2] != null
                        && handler.players[i2].isActive
                        && misc.playerNameToInt64(
                                handler.players[i2].playerName)
                                        == friends[i]) {
                    if (playerRights >= 2
                            || handler.players[i2].Privatechat == 0
                            || (handler.players[i2].Privatechat == 1
                                    && handler.players[i2].isinpm(
                                            misc.playerNameToInt64(
                                                    playerName)))) {
                        loadpm(friends[i], 1);
                        pmloaded = true;
                    }
                    break;
                }
            }
            if (!pmloaded) {
                loadpm(friends[i], 0);
            }
            pmloaded = false;
        }
        for (int i1 = 1; i1 < handler.maxPlayers; i1++) {
            if (handler.players[i1] != null
                    && handler.players[i1].isActive == true) {
                handler.players[i1].pmupdate(playerId, 1);
            }
        }
    }
}</blockquote>

back up and replace yours with this one
its czar code but it should work fine i think you need to make some adjustments though

Read full topic
